content: YouTrip Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 May 2019What is the best credit card to top up YouTrip card?3 answersAnswerBump4
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Javier Lim, Financial Consultant at Prudential Assurance Company SingaporeLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 28 Jul 2019Most local banks would exclude such transactions (Prepaid / Stored Value cards) for Miles or Cashback; maybe you can consider using OCBC Cashflo for Free 3/6 months installment?0 comments4

NNNicholas NbxLevel 2. RookieUpdated on 23 Aug 2019So far I saw YouTrip is specifically excluded from Citibank and UOB card. But it worked for Standard Chartered Unlimited Cashback. I've tried and gotten 1.5% cashback on all my YouTrip top-ups with that card, at least at the of time of this post. Hope it helps!0 comments1

Chin Guo QiangLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 09 Jun 2019I personally use DBS SAFRA Credit Card as with $500 credit card spending comes a basic 3% cashback rebates, in the form of SAFRA$. Which can be used to offset credit card bill payments or redeem for Singapore Airlines (SQ) KrisFlyer Miles (not a good ratio though).Hope this helps. :)1 comment0

M Sim QY09 Jun 2019You sure topup Youtrip pays reward points? 
I checked with DBS. They said their cards do not pay out reward points/ miles for topup to Youtrip
